thread.section_title: Greatmats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greatmats | www.greatmats.com | 3 of 122
thread.title: Brandy R.

author: Brandy R.
title: Brandy R.
text:
I opened a yoga studio and this flooring is perfect! It shipped quickly & arrived on time in perfect condition. The flooring is high quality and looks great. The customer service representatives I worked with were knowledgeable and very friendly. They helped me reconfigure my square footage (my room is really oddly shaped) and saved me almost $200.
I would absolutely purchase from Great Mats again and have zero reservations about recommending them to others.
